message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000. I think you'll find this price reflects the quality and benefits it offers.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true worth. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000? This offer represents a fair deal for both of us.
I've considered your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I can't agree to $12,000. I'm willing to go up to $11,000. This seems like a fair compromise.
Bob, I appreciate you moving closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.  How about we settle at $11,500?  This reflects the product's value while acknowledging your budget.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. This seems to be a fair compromise considering the value and my budget.
